General.Name: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited
General.Description: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades bread products, colors, fragrances, and chemicals that are used in food, beverage, and consumer product industries in Thailand. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

0.Name: Dr. Somchai  Ratanapoompinyo
0.Title: CEO, Chief Marketing & Acting Planning Officer and Director
